# NoBox Console Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

All security bugs in NoBox Console should be reported to the maintainers. Your report will be acknowledged within 24 hours, and youâ€™ll receive a more detailed response indicating the next steps in handling your report.

After the initial reply to your report, we will endeavor to keep you informed of the progress being made towards a fix and full announcement.
